column1: State gov announced expanded coronavirus testing at shopping centres, including mobile stations at Pacific Werribee & Bunnings West Footscray. People should get tested, even if symptoms are only mild. More info: https://www.premier.vic.gov.au/coronavirus-testing-expands-at-shopping-centres/ Testing locations: http://www.dhhs.vic.gov.au/victorian-public-coronavirus-disease-covid-19#where-can-i-get-tested-for-coronavirus-covid-19
